content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

if OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zones') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL table bronze.taxi_zones go

create EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zones 
    (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
        )
        with(
            location = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
            data_source = logical_DWH_exDS,
            file_format =csv_file_pv1,
            reject_value = 10,
            rejected_row_location = 'rejections/taxi_zone'
            ) go

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.taxi_zones go
